      private boolean TableUpdateProcessor.validatePrimaryKeys​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ColumnDetails> rowData)
      the validatePrimaryKeys function checks if a column is a primary key, it shouldn't be null and should match the columns data type
      private boolean TableUpdateProcessor.validateRow​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ColumnDetails> rowData)
      the function validateRow verifies that the rowData should not be empty if the column is not nullable and and try to convert values in column required data type if it's not able to convert return false else return false
